ofx:section.ofx:title: Roles
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: - Categories (of Roles) - Roles (Roles for the Category) - Role (a User Category including permission and actions for the Group)

Roles describes the function of a single person in this system. As you can see, there are divided into categories and you get the existing roles to a category by clicking on it. Click on the role you want to edit. If you want to add a user-role to a Use-Case, click on the green plus in the upper right corner and select the Use-Case you want to add. This method is also working with views and actions. These new rights are available after relogging into the system.
